price: 17. Mpe oyo alekisi kobuba nde oyo azali kobukela Allah lokuta, to aboyi kondimela mikapo mia ye? Ya solo, ye akolongisa batomboki te.
arabic: فَمَنۡ أَظۡلَمُ مِمَّنِ ٱفۡتَرَىٰ عَلَى ٱللَّهِ كَذِبًا أَوۡ كَذَّبَ بِـَٔايَٰتِهِۦٓۚ إِنَّهُۥ لَا يُفۡلِحُ ٱلۡمُجۡرِمُونَ

version.title: Lingala translation
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur’an into the Lingala language, translated by Zakaria Muhammad Balngogo.

meta.transliteration: faman aẓlamu mimmani if'tarā ʿalā al-lahi kadhiban aw kadhaba biāyātihi innahu lā yuf'liḥu al-muj'rimūna
